page.description: When you click F1 in the Xbasic Editor or Action Script Editor, Alpha Anywhere will display help for the function, method, or language element under the cursor. You can customize help so that clicking F1:

case.description: displays a topic from the help files on your PC
displays a topic from the Alpha Software WebHelp through an Internet connection
lets you choose between the two alternatives

section.description: You can set the primary and secondary sources of help to be either local help files or Internet WebHelp. If, for any reason, the primary source is unavailable, Alpha Anywhere will retrieve help from the secondary source. Both help systems include help for all the following topics.
